# -*- ck2.landed_titles -*-

# HOLY ORDERS
d_knights_templar = { # Knights Templar
	color = { 230 230 230 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	graphical_culture = holygfx
	capital = 138 # Orléans # Orleans
	title = GRANDMASTER
	foa = GRANDMASTER_FOA
	# Always exists
	landless = yes
	holy_order = yes
	mercenary_type = knights_templar_composition
	culture = frankish
	# Parent Religion
	religion = catholic
	# Cannot be held as a secondary title
	primary = yes
	# Extra income due to banking, etc
	monthly_income = 10 # (Must be an integer between 1 and 512)
}

	color2 = { 255 255 255 }

	religion = sunni
	culture = cuman

			religion_group = zoroastrian_group
		}
	}
}

	k_lotharingia = { # Lotharingen
		color = { 144 80 60 }
		color2 = { 220 220 255 }
		capital = 128 # Metz
		culture = low_frankish
		dignity = 30 # One more than Burgundy
		allow = { title_king_basic_allow = yes }
	}
	allow = {
		FROM = {
			has_holder = yes
			is_de_jure_title = yes
		}
		OR = {
			realm_size = 320
			AND = {
				realm_size = 120
				OR = {
					not_emf_trigger = yes
					FROM = {
						has_holder = yes
						has_law = crown_authority_4
					}
					AND = {
						FROM = { has_holder = no }
						primary_title = {
							OR = {
								has_law = crown_authority_3
								has_law = crown_authority_4
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		title_emperor_basic_allow = yes
	}
} # end e_hre

		gain_effect = {
			# If title receiver also owns the titular Tara, then
			# we can safely destroy and deactivate that title now.
			k_ireland_titular = { # Tara
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							has_holder = no
							holder = PREV
						}
					}
					hidden_tooltip = {
						# If it somehow became non-titular, then we must be sure
						# to transfer its de jure territory to k_ireland first.
						any_direct_de_jure_vassal_title = { de_jure_liege = k_ireland }
					}
					activate_title = {
						title = THIS
						status = no
					}
					destroy_landed_title = THIS
				}
			}
		}
		allow = { title_king_basic_allow = yes }
	} # end k_ireland

	allow = {
		OR = {
			realm_size = 220
			AND = {
				realm_size = 120
				OR = {
					not_emf_trigger = yes
					FROM = {
						has_holder = yes
						has_law = crown_authority_4
					}
					AND = {
						FROM = { has_holder = no }
						primary_title = {
							OR = {
								has_law = crown_authority_3
								has_law = crown_authority_4
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		title_emperor_basic_allow = yes
	}
} # end e_persia

# All landed kingdom titles that have no de jure empire must go
# into e_null, a clever solution to Paradox bugs.
e_null = {
	color = { 38 38 38 }
	color2 = { 0 0 0 }
	capital = 774 # Jérusalem # Jerusalem
	short_name = yes
	# Must be defined before k_armenia
	k_bagratid_grand_principality = { # Hayk
		color = { 117 178 81 }
		culture = armenian
		capital = 681 # Ani
		title = ISHKHAN
		foa = ISHKHAN_FOA
		title_prefix = ISHKHAN_OF
		allow = {
			culture = armenian
			religion_group = christian
			title_king_basic_allow = yes
		}
	}
	k_armenia = { # Hayk
		color = { 254 203 44 }
		color2 = { 255 255 255 }
		capital = 681 # Ani
		culture = armenian
		orthodox = 300 # Crusade target weight
		muslim = 200 # Crusade target weight
		d_artsakh = { # Khachen
			color = { 48 111 75 }
			color2 = { 255 255 255 }
			culture = armenian
			oghuz = "Qarabag"
			turkmen = "Qarabag"
			turkish = "Qarabag"
			capital = 1085 # Artsakh
			c_artsakh = { # Artsakh (1085)
				color = { 166 238 26 }
				color2 = { 255 255 255 }

				turkmen = "Artsah"
				turkish = "Artsah"
				b_khachen = {
					oghuz = "Seyidbeyli"
					turkmen = "Seyidbeyli"
					turkish = "Seyidbeyli"
					armenian = "Khachen"
				}
				b_vararakn = {
					oghuz = "Xankendi"
					turkmen = "Xankendi"
					turkish = "Xankendi"
				}
				b_jrvshtik = {}
				b_haterk = {
					oghuz = "Hasanriz"
					turkmen = "Hasanriz"
					turkish = "Hasanriz"
				}
				b_vaykunik = {}
				b_gandzasar = {}
			}
			c_haband = { # Haband (726)
				color = { 166 238 96 }
				color2 = { 255 255 255 }
				b_ktish = {}

		d_suenik = { # Siwnik
			color = { 47 17 85 }

		gain_effect = {
			# If title receiver also owns the titular Hayk, then
			# we can safely destroy and deactivate that title now.
			k_bagratid_grand_principality = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							has_holder = no
							holder = PREV
						}
					}
					hidden_tooltip = {
						# If it somehow became non-titular, then we must be sure
						# to transfer its de jure territory to k_armenia first.
						any_direct_de_jure_vassal_title = { de_jure_liege = k_armenia }
					}
					activate_title = {
						title = THIS
						status = no
					}
					destroy_landed_title = THIS
				}
			}
		}
		allow = { title_king_basic_allow = yes }
	} # end k_armenia

	##### Finnish
	k_finland = { # Suomi
		color = { 140 65 65 }
		color2 = { 255 255 255 }

		catholic = 40 # Crusade target weight

	title_female = QUEEN
	dynasty_title_names = no # Will not be named "Seljuk", etc.

	allow = { title_king_basic_allow = yes }
}

# TITULAR EMPIRES
e_latin_empire = { # Imperium Romaniae
	color = { 150 105 56 }
	capital = 496 # Konstantinoupolis # Byzantion
	short_name = yes
	allow = {
		OR = {
			religion = catholic
			is_heresy_of = catholic
		}
		e_byzantium = { # Basileia Rhõmaiõn
			has_holder = no
		}
		e_roman_empire = { # Roman Empire
			has_holder = no
		}
		custom_tooltip = {
			text = controls_kaliopolis_thrake
			hidden_tooltip = {
				495 = { # Kaliopolis
					owner_under_ROOT = yes
				}
				497 = { # Thrake
					owner_under_ROOT = yes
				}
			}
		}
		title_emperor_basic_allow = yes
	}
} # end e_latin_empire
### INDIA ###

	title = SAMRAT_CHAKRAVARTIN
	title_female = SAMRAJNI_CHAKRAVARTIN

}
